ns0:entry.ns0:title: MewPurPur/GodSVG
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/MewPurPur/GodSVG
Language: gdscript
A vector graphics application for structured SVG editing, available on all major desktop platforms and on web. Currently in late alpha.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: Orama-Interactive/Pixelorama
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/Orama-Interactive/Pixelorama
Language: gdscript
Unleash your creativity with Pixelorama, a powerful and accessible open-source pixel art multitool. Whether you want to create sprites, tiles, animations, or just express yourself in the language of pixel art, this software will realize your pixel-perfect dreams with a vast toolbox of features. Available on Windows, Linux, macOS and the Web!

ns0:entry.ns0:title: RodZill4/material-maker
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/RodZill4/material-maker
Language: gdscript
A procedural textures authoring and 3D model painting tool based on the Godot game engine

ns0:entry.ns0:title: db0/godot-card-game-framework
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/db0/godot-card-game-framework
Language: gdscript
A framework which comes with prepared scenes and classes to kickstart your card game, as well as a powerful scripting engine to use to provide full rules enforcement.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: dialogic-godot/dialogic
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/dialogic-godot/dialogic
Language: gdscript
ðŸ’¬ Create Dialogs, Visual Novels, RPGs, and manage Characters with Godot to create your Game!

ns0:entry.ns0:title: ee0pdt/Godot-MCP
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/ee0pdt/Godot-MCP
Language: gdscript
An MCP for Godot that lets you create and edit games in the Godot game engine with tools like Claude

ns0:entry.ns0:title: mbrlabs/Lorien
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/mbrlabs/Lorien
Language: gdscript
Infinite canvas drawing/whiteboarding app for Windows, Linux and macOS. Made with Godot.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: ramokz/phantom-camera
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/ramokz/phantom-camera
Language: gdscript
ðŸ‘»ðŸŽ¥ Control the movement and dynamically tween 2D & 3D cameras. Built for Godot 4. Inspired by Cinemachine.
